tcg

Class AbstractPokemon

  • java.lang.Object
    • tcg.AbstractPokemon
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    tcg.ICard, tcg.IPokemon

    public abstract class AbstractPokemon
extends java.lang.Object
implements tcg.IPokemon
    The base class for all the Pokemon. Contains getter and some setter methods for the Pokemon's properties. Also contains the attack method according to the type of attack.

    • Constructor Summary

      Creates a new Pokemon

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractPokemon

        public AbstractPokemon(int aId,
                       int anHp,
                       java.util.ArrayList<tcg.IEnergy> anEnergies,
                       java.util.ArrayList<tcg.IAttack> anAttacks)
        Creates a new Pokemon
        Parameters:
        aId - the id of the pokemon.
        anHp - health points of the pokemon.
        anEnergies - energies associated with the pokemon.
        anAttacks - the types of attacks of the pokemon. Maximum of 4.
